sentences.sContent: The blood supply bifurcates between eight and thirty times before reaching each particular location in the body.
sentences.sCn: 血液在到达身体各个特定部位前要分流8到30次。

remMethod.val: bi(两个) + furc(看作fork, 叉) + ate → 分为两支

trans.tranOther: If something such as a line or path bifurcates or is bifurcated, it divides into two parts which go in different directions
